message: This offer represents a fair split considering our current wealth. I propose we divide the funds 60/40 in favor of Alice.
I think 70/30 is a more reasonable split, considering the risk and effort we both bring to the table.

Considering the rejection of the previous offer and the inflation effect, I propose an equal division of the funds. This ensures fairness and acknowledges the diminishing value of money with each round.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly smaller share, but I believe 55/45 is a more accurate reflection of my contributions to the partnership.
